name: rnafusion-cancer-fusion-calling
title: RNAfusion: Cancer Gene Fusion Detection
description: Multi-tool fusion transcript detection from RNA-seq. Identifies oncogenic gene fusions (BCR-ABL, EML4-ALK) using STAR-Fusion, Arriba, and FusionCatcher with consensus calling for cancer diagnostics.
content:
RNAfusion: Gene Fusion Detection

Comprehensive fusion transcript detection using multiple tools (STAR-Fusion, Arriba, FusionCatcher). Essential for cancer diagnosis, prognosis, and targeted therapy selection.

Applications

  • Cancer Diagnostics: CML (BCR-ABL), NSCLC (EML4-ALK)
  • Targeted Therapy: Identify druggable fusions
  • Disease Monitoring: MRD tracking
  • Immunotherapy: Neo-antigen prediction

Key Outputs

  • Fusion Calls: High-confidence gene fusions
  • Consensus Analysis: Agreement across tools
  • Breakpoint Sequences: Junction reads
  • Clinical Annotations: Known oncogenic fusions

Perfect for: Cancer fusion detection • RNA-seq fusion calling • Targeted therapy • Clinical diagnostics
